The perfect three combo

also (idk why I feel like I need to add this lol) no im not saying that rape dj shouldn't exist cause theyre really insensitive towards rape victims (many of my fav dj are rape ones) I was just surprised because this is not the usual rape shota dj

the art style is really cute, but I was kinda surprised for the representation of rape in this doujinshi; in most dj I've read the "victim" almost always ends up enjoying it but this is a more realistic take on rape, in irl it never is a "onichan yamete kudasai" shit in most cases the victim ends up traumatized for life. I personally don't see myself fapping to this because of the violence against the cute shota (don't hit shotas pls)
